remarks: Lemma for ~ zlpir .  All elements of a nonzero ideal of integers are divided by the least one.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Jan-2015.) Obsolete version of ~ zringlpirlem3 as of 9-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
zlpirlem.z $e |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) $.
zlpirlem.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. ( LIdeal ` Z ) ) $.
zlpirlem.n0 $e |- ( ph -> I =/= { 0 } ) $.
zlpirlem.g $e |- G = sup ( ( I i^i NN ) , RR , `' < ) $.
zlpirlem.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. I ) $.
zlpirlem3 $p |- ( ph -> G || X ) $.
